"ワイルドイースター":
"Hey hey! It is I, the great Huey! So you
know the ARKS are holding this thing
called Easter soon? I'm helping out but
for some reason we're being swamped
with hostiles on Lillipa where this
is all going down! Even I can't handle
this one alone! I'm counting on all
of you to pitch in!
――――――――――――――――――――
Fracaso: fallas el objetivo si Finaliza el tiempo limite."
"スイッチを起動しエネミーを殲滅せよ！"
